collectionServer.name: Collection Server
collectionServer.description:
Sets the server URL for sending the UUIDs to.

Format: http(s)://domain.tld/x/
- Must end with a /
- x represents the root route to the collection server
  - Example: https://db.lilo-lookup.de/api/

authenticationKey.name: Authentication Key
authenticationKey.description: Your authentication key for the specified server.
